title: For the Beautiful People
description: Adeline Jamieson has been bullied by her used-to-be best friend ever since grade seven. Payton takes every chance she can to make Adeline feel worthless. When her life seems like its in a down hill spiral, Adeline befriends a captivating girl with Down's Syndrome. Karlee shows her that life does go on and that you can't give up on that small glimmer of hope. Like a runner, you have the smallest bit of energy left, just waiting until the end so you can blast ahead. But when things start to go down hill again, will Karlee teach Adeline to forgive and push ahead, or will she crumble under the weight of her world.
author: Hannah Godard
